item.description:
Mass Networking is Back at Dedham Fridays and Could go over 60 Attending This Month

*Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals and Then Watch Boston Celtics/Miami Heat Basketball Game*

Bring some business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013.  Dress code is business casual

(Free Appetizers and Plenty of Parking at Great Location, Just off 128 on Rte. 1 North across from Panera and before Best Buy/BJ's)

[Get Advance Tickets Now at http://massnetworking0318.eventbrite.com]
Only $5, $8 Cash at the Door if Available

*Doing a Charity Raffle with chance to Win 2 tickets for Kelly Clarkson Concert on 5/2 in Boston and more!  Proceeds going to Sandy Hook and are $5/entry!  First 20 to Attend Event will get 1 Free Raffle Ticket!  Also, getting a group together to go see her!*

Raffles are Sponsored by www.BestNetShopping.com (Over 4000 Stores/Websites like Groupon, Sears, Pet Smart, Lowes, Home Depot, Angie's List and more with up to 50% Cash Back on Purchases) & www.Website-Business-Solutions.com (Up to 75% off on Top Notch Websites with E-Commerce and SEO) Check them out and Save!
item.name: Mass Networking Dedham - Social Event* (50+ Expected)
